ing: 3/4 fluid ounce bitter orange aperitif (such as AperolÂ®)
des: "A citrus-infused cocktail from the Tiny Lounge in Chicago, the Cusco combines pisco brandy, the Italian bitter-orange aperitif called AperolÂ®, and lemon, grapefruit, and lime juices."
ins: Place ice into a cocktail shaker. Pour pisco, lime juice, bitter orange aperitif, simple syrup, lemon juice, and grapefruit juice into shaker. Shake a few times to combine; pour into a tall glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
